resources.string:
ATTENTION : Le transfert rapide entraînera l'abandon de toutes les missions de faction JcJ.
{count} seront abandonnées.

Continuer ?
You cannot fast travel while at war
You cannot fast travel while encumbered
You cannot recall or fast travel when you are dead.
{coin} is required to fast travel
{coin} is required to fast travel
Pay {coin} to reset cooldown.
You cannot fast travel while in an encounter
Transfert rapide impossible lorsque vous êtes dans une Déferlante
You need {coin} to reset cooldown.
{coin} Reset Cooldown
Taxes must be paid to decorate your home.
Transfert vers une colonie, un avant-poste ou un sanctuaire spirituel déjà visité.
Voulez-vous effectuer un transfert rapide vers ce lieu ?
Would you like to recall to this inn?
Voulez-vous retourner à cette tour de guet : {territoryName} ?
Would you like to recall to your house?
Would you like to reset cooldown?
You don’t have any group members living in this plot.
You already have 1 house in this town.\n Would you like to abandon {houseName} to purchase this house?\nAll trophies & furniture in the abandoned house will be moved into Town Storage.
You can only have one house in a town.

<font color="#f25d5d">Purchase cost and taxes will not be refunded if this house is abandoned.</font>
All trophies & furniture in the abandoned house will be moved into Town Storage.

To continue, type {territoryName} below.
Purchase cost and taxes will not be refunded if this house is abandoned. All trophies and furniture in the house will be moved to the town storage.
You are invisible to other players
/requis par loyer pour entretenir cette maison
This plot is full.\nThere's no available unit for sale.
Cette maison nécessite le niveau {standingRank} de réputation de territoire à : {standingName} pour acheter.
Requires level {level} to purchase next home
Bonus de permission de logement du territoire avec : {standingName} nécessaire

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#F25D5D">You don't have</font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font"> House Ownership Bonus </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#F25D5D">in this territory to purchase a house.</font>\n <font color="#AAAAAA">Le bonus de propriété de logement est disponible au</font> <font color="#EEEEEE">niveau {standingRank} de réputation de territoire.</font>
Congratulations, you are now a <font color="#FFFFFF">home owner</font> in <font color="#F4D179">{settlementName}</font>! Make sure to pay property tax to use the housing features!
House disabled due to unpaid property taxes.
Property Tax due at {territoryName} in: {time}. Pay the property tax to continue using Fast-travel and decoration
Property tax Overdue at {territoryName}. Pay the property tax to continue using Fast-travel and decoration
Retard de paiement des impôts fonciers : payez vos impôts fonciers pour activer des fonctionnalités de logement.
You need more coin to purchase this house.
Your house is disabled. Pay tax now to re-enable your house!

The 20 homes with the highest housing points are updated in this list every 2 days.\n\nThe housing points are calculated based on the player's gained Territory Standing and the furniture placed on the property.
This list will be updated in <font color="#ffffff">{time}</font>
Place trophies that give you buffs
Un trophée qui vous inspire par sa présence dans votre foyer.
Max Homes Owned In This Territory
Pay Property tax via the map or at your house.
Error paying taxes on home, please try again.

Vous devez payer des taxes foncières pour retourner et réapparaître dans votre maison, ou décorer votre maison.\nLes taxes doivent être payées {firstCycle} après l'achat d'une maison, puis chaque {otherCycle}.
Payez les taxes foncières pour continuer à utiliser les caractéristiques du logement.
You sucessfully paid the Property Tax of your house.
There are no other players currently living in this plot.
Cannot place, item limit for this item reached
Cannot place, too many items of this type
Cannot place, too many items of this type
{territoryName} is now your new recall point.
Retour à la tour de guet
<font color="#73b651"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_bold.font">Checked in</font></font>\nActive Inn. You can recall and respawn at this inn from anywhere in the world.
<font color="#949494"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_bold.font">Not Checked In</font></font>\nCheck in at the inn to set a respawn and recall point.

<font color="#ffffff"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font">Welcome to {territoryName} Inn!</font></font>

 Would you like to <font color="#f3d981"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font">check in</font></font>?

This will allow you to recall and respawn at this settlement
from anywhere in the world!

<font color="#ffffff"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font">Welcome to {territoryName} Inn!</font></font>

 Would you like to <font color="#f3d981"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font">check in</font></font>?
This will allow you to recall and respawn at this settlement
from anywhere in the world!

<font color="#f3d981">This will replace your current recall point.</font>

Oh, It seems like you already checked into this inn!

You can recall and respawn at this settlement
from anywhere in the world!
Fast Travel To This Settlement for {cost}
Cette action est cours de recharge.
Cette action est cours de recharge.\nRetour possible dans {time}.
You have to visit this settlement first in order to fast travel.
You have to visit this outpost first in order to fast travel.
Vous ne pouvez effectuer de transfert rapide que dans une colonie, un avant-poste ou un sanctuaire spirituel.
You can't fast travel or recall when you are encumbered.
Recall is not available due to server error.
Check in at the inn to activate the recall point in this settlement.
Louez une chambre à l'auberge pour activer le point de retour de cet avant-poste.
Louez une chambre à l'auberge pour activer un point de retour.
Vous pouvez utiliser le retour pour réapparaître dans votre maison tant que vous payez vos impôts.
À cause des changements à : {settlement}, votre maison vous a été remboursée. Vous avez reçu : {cost}  et récupéré tous vos objets.
À cause des changements à : {settlement}, un objet de logement est retourné dans votre inventaire.
À cause des changements à : {settlement}, {count} objets de logement sont retournés dans votre inventaire.
Due to incorrect messaging around taxes for first time homebuyers, you have been granted {amount} as a homebuyer. We hope you continue to enjoy New World and your house.
Tous les objets de cette maison
Voulez-vous vraiment ranger tous les objets placés dans cette maison ? Tous les objets seront renvoyés dans votre espace de stockage.
